price: Nokorε sε, na yεrehwehwε (kwan) sε, yεbɛduru ͻsoro hͻ (akͻtie adwen a, εhͻfoͻ no refa), nanso yɛhunuu sε, awεnfoͻ ahoͻdenfoͻ ne ogya tanaa ayε hͻ mma.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lamasnā al-samāa fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhuban
